title: Paxman on World War One
itunes:title: Paxman on World War One
itunes:subtitle: Jeremy Paxman discusses Britain in the First World War, as his new BBC TV series is about to air. Meanwhile, Miles Russell takes us on a trip to a luxurious Roman home  See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.
